title: Public company:  minimum registered capital.
content: 4A. (1) The minimum capital of a public company, which has been offered for subscription, shall be twenty-five thousand, six hundred and twenty nine euros. (2) The capital mentioned in subsection (1) is mandatory to exist at the latest, at the time when the issuance of the certificate provided for in subsection (4) of section 104, as the subsection is renumbered by section 24 of this Law, is requested from the Registrar. Stamp and signature of memorandum. 2 of 76 of 1977.
